Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: (b) On January 27, 2023, Susan J.S. Taylor informed Meta Platforms, Inc. (“Meta”) of her decision to resign from her position as Chief Accounting Officer of Meta after a transition period. Ms. Taylor’s decision to resign was due to personal reasons and not as a result of any disagreement with Meta on any matter relating to its operations, policies or practices.

subsections.resignation_details: On January 27, 2023, Susan J.S. Taylor informed Meta Platforms, Inc. (“Meta”) of her decision to resign from her position as Chief Accounting Officer of Meta after a transition period.
subsections.reason_for_resignation: Ms. Taylor’s decision to resign was due to personal reasons and not as a result of any disagreement with Meta on any matter relating to its operations, policies or practices.
